gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 116, Cavaliers 97
gameRecap.excerpt: Los Angeles defeats Cleveland, 116-97. For Los Angeles, DAngelo Russell led the way with 28 points, five rebounds, and six 3PM while aided by Lebron James (24 points, five rebounds, 12 assists) and Anthony Davis (22 points, 13 rebounds, three steals, six blocks) in the victory. Darius Garland finished with 26 points and five steals with Caris LeVert recording 21 points and seven rebounds for Cleveland in the losing effort. Los Angeles improves to 45-33, while Cleveland moves to 46-32 with the loss.
